Key Arguments: Terms like misinformation and disinformation are subjective and can be used to suppress truth.
Debate is the natural way to discuss and critique ideas, not government regulation.
The process for public feedback is disingenuous due to the complexity and length of the associated documents.
Notable Quotes: DO NOT TAMPER WITH THE CITIZENS’ RIGHT TO FREE SPEECH.
THESE TERMS ARE SUBJECTIVE AND WHAT IS DEEMED MIS/DIS INFORMATION TO ONE, MAY CONSTITUTE THE TRUTH TO OTHERS.
KEEP YOUR HANDS OFF OUR FREEDOM OF SPEECH (OR WHAT’S LEFT OF IT)!!!!
